<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script">
    <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <abort_action>false</abort_action>
        <access>package_private</access>
        <action_delete>false</action_delete>
        <action_insert>true</action_insert>
        <action_query>false</action_query>
        <action_update>true</action_update>
        <active>true</active>
        <add_message>false</add_message>
        <advanced>true</advanced>
        <change_fields>false</change_fields>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <collection>sn_ent_model_classification</collection>
        <condition/>
        <description/>
        <execute_function>false</execute_function>
        <filter_condition table="sn_ent_model_classification">cmdb_model_categoryVALCHANGES^cmdb_model_categoryISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/>
        </filter_condition>
        <is_rest>false</is_rest>
        <message/>
        <name>Validate model categories</name>
        <order>100</order>
        <priority>100</priority>
        <rest_method/>
        <rest_method_text/>
        <rest_service/>
        <rest_service_text/>
        <rest_variables/>
        <role_conditions/>
        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	// Validate only enterprise model categories can be assigned to classification codes
	var flag = true;
	var enterpriseCategories = [];
	var categories = current.getValue('cmdb_model_category');
	categories = categories.split(",");

	var catRec;
	var entClasses;
	var categoryClass;
	var nonEnterpriseCategories = [];

	for (i = 0; i < categories.length; i++) {
		catRec = new GlideRecord('cmdb_model_category');
		catRec.get(categories[i]);
		categoryClass = catRec.getValue('product_model_class');

		entClasses = EnterpriseContentEAMUtils.getEAMModelClasses();

		if (entClasses.indexOf(categoryClass) < 0) {
			flag = false;
			nonEnterpriseCategories.push(catRec.name);
		} else {
			enterpriseCategories.push(categories[i]);
		}
	}
	
	if (flag === false) {
		current.setValue('cmdb_model_category', enterpriseCategories);
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Cannot assign non-enterprise categories {0}.", [nonEnterpriseCategories.toString()]));
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-22 18:46:10</sys_created_on>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path>
        <sys_id>2cd1276f37052510d1697bad41c06704</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Validate model categories</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="">7e67d4ff091b4110f87739da6a8d8c7d</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">7e67d4ff091b4110f87739da6a8d8c7d</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_2cd1276f37052510d1697bad41c06704</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-03 01:31:32</sys_updated_on>
        <template/>
        <when>before</when>
    </sys_script>
    <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2cd1276f37052510d1697bad41c06704"/>
</record_update>
